1: נָ֣סוּ <sup>5127 </sup> <n>flee</n> וְאֵין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>no</n> רֹדֵ֣ף <sup>7291 </sup> <n>when no man pursueth</n> רָשָׁ֑ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>The wicked</n> וְ֝צַדִּיקִ֗ים <sup>6662 </sup> <n>but the righteous</n> כִּכְפִ֥יר <sup>3715 </sup> <n>as a lion</n> יִבְטָֽח׃ <sup>982 </sup> <n>are bold</n>
2: בְּפֶ֣שַֽׁע <sup>6588 </sup> <n>For the transgression</n> אֶ֭רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of a land</n> רַבִּ֣ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>many</n> שָׂרֶ֑יהָ <sup>8269 </sup> <n>[are] the princes</n> וּבְאָדָ֥ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>thereof but by a man</n> מֵבִ֥ין <sup>995 </sup> <n>of understanding</n> יֹ֝דֵ֗עַ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>[and] knowledge</n> כֵּ֣ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>the state</n> יַאֲרִֽיךְ׃ <sup>748 </sup> <n>[thereof] shall be prolonged</n>
3: גֶּ֣בֶר <sup>1397 </sup> <n>man</n> רָ֭שׁ <sup>7326 </sup> <n>A poor</n> וְעֹשֵׁ֣ק <sup>6231 </sup> <n>that oppresseth</n> דַּלִּ֑ים <sup>1800 </sup> <n>the poor</n> מָטָ֥ר <sup>4306 </sup> <n>rain</n> סֹ֝חֵ֗ף <sup>5502 </sup> <n>[is like] a sweeping</n> וְאֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>leaves</n> לָֽחֶם׃ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>which leaveth no food</n>
4: עֹזְבֵ֣י <sup>5800 </sup> <n>They that forsake</n> ת֭וֹרָה <sup>8451 </sup> <n>the law</n> יְהַֽלְל֣וּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>praise</n> רָשָׁ֑ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>the wicked</n> וְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <sup>8104 </sup> <n>but such as keep</n> ת֝וֹרָ֗ה <sup>8451 </sup> <n>the law</n> יִתְגָּ֥רוּ <sup>1624 </sup> <n>contend</n> בָֽם׃ פ
5: אַנְשֵׁי־ <sup>582 </sup> <n>men</n> רָ֭ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>Evil</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָבִ֣ינוּ <sup>995 </sup> <n>understand</n> מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>not judgment</n> וּמְבַקְשֵׁ֥י <sup>1245 </sup> <n>but they that seek</n> יְ֝הוָ֗ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> יָבִ֥ינוּ <sup>995 </sup> <n>understand</n> כֹֽל׃ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n>
6: טֽוֹב־ <sup>2896 </sup> <n>Better</n> רָ֭שׁ <sup>7326 </sup> <n>[is] the poor</n> הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>that walketh</n> בְּתֻמּ֑וֹ <sup>8537 </sup> <n>in his uprightness</n> מֵעִקֵּ֥שׁ <sup>6141 </sup> <n>than [he that is] perverse</n> דְּ֝רָכַ֗יִם <sup>1870 </sup> <n>[in his] ways</n> וְה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> עָשִֽׁיר׃ <sup>6223 </sup> <n>though he [be] rich</n>
7: נוֹצֵ֣ר <sup>5341 </sup> <n>Whoso keepeth</n> תּ֭וֹרָה <sup>8451 </sup> <n>the law</n> בֵּ֣ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>son</n> מֵבִ֑ין <sup>995 </sup> <n>[is] a wise</n> וְרֹעֶה <sup>7462 </sup> <n>but he that is a companion</n> זֽ֝וֹלְלִ֗ים <sup>2151 </sup> <n>of riotous</n> יַכְלִ֥ים <sup>3637 </sup> <n>[men] shameth</n> אָבִֽיו׃ <sup>1 </sup> <n>his father</n>
8: מַרְבֶּ֣ה <sup>7235 </sup> <n>increaseth</n> ה֭וֹנוֹ <sup>1952 </sup> <n>his substance</n> בְּנֶ֣שֶׁךְ <sup>5392 </sup> <n>He that by usury</n> [וּבְתַרְבִּית כ] (וְתַרְבִּ֑ית <sup>8636 </sup> <n>increase</n> ק) לְחוֹנֵ֖ן <sup>2603 </sup> <n>it for him that will pity</n> דַּלִּ֣ים <sup>1800 </sup> <n>the poor</n> יִקְבְּצֶֽנּוּ׃ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>he shall gather</n>
9: מֵסִ֣יר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>He that turneth away</n> אָ֭זְנוֹ <sup>241 </sup> <n>his ear</n> מִשְּׁמֹ֣עַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>from hearing</n> תּוֹרָ֑ה <sup>8451 </sup> <n>the law</n> גַּֽם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>Even</n> תְּ֝פִלָּת֗וֹ <sup>8605 </sup> <n>even his prayer</n> תּוֹעֵבָֽה׃ <sup>8441 </sup> <n>[shall be] abomination</n>
10: מַשְׁגֶּ֤ה <sup>7686 </sup> <n>to go astray</n> יְשָׁרִ֨ים ׀ <sup>3477 </sup> <n>Whoso causeth the righteous</n> בְּדֶ֥רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>way</n> רָ֗ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>in an evil</n> בִּשְׁחוּת֥וֹ <sup>7816 </sup> <n>himself into his own pit</n> הֽוּא־ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>will himself</n> יִפּ֑וֹל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>he shall fall</n> וּ֝תְמִימִ֗ים <sup>8549 </sup> <n>but the upright</n> יִנְחֲלוּ־ <sup>5157 </sup> <n>[things] in possession</n> טֽוֹב׃ <sup>2896 </sup> <n>shall have good</n>
11: חָכָ֣ם <sup>2450 </sup> <n>[is] wise</n> בְּ֭עֵינָיו <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in his own conceit</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> עָשִׁ֑יר <sup>6223 </sup> <n>The rich</n> וְדַ֖ל <sup>1800 </sup> <n>but the poor</n> מֵבִ֣ין <sup>995 </sup> <n>that hath understanding</n> יַחְקְרֶֽנּוּ׃ <sup>2713 </sup> <n>searcheth him out</n>
12: בַּעֲלֹ֣ץ <sup>5970 </sup> <n>[men] do rejoice</n> צַ֭דִּיקִים <sup>6662 </sup> <n>When righteous</n> רַבָּ֣ה <sup>7227 </sup> <n>[there is] great</n> תִפְאָ֑רֶת <sup>8597 </sup> <n>glory</n> וּבְק֥וּם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>rise</n> רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <sup>7563 </sup> <n>but when the wicked</n> יְחֻפַּ֥שׂ <sup>2664 </sup> <n>is hidden</n> אָדָֽם׃ <sup>120 </sup> <n>a man</n>
13: מְכַסֶּ֣ה <sup>3680 </sup> <n>He that covereth</n> פְ֭שָׁעָיו <sup>6588 </sup> <n>his sins</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> יַצְלִ֑יחַ <sup>6743 </sup> <n>shall not prosper</n> וּמוֹדֶ֖ה <sup>3034 </sup> <n>but whoso confesseth</n> וְעֹזֵ֣ב <sup>5800 </sup> <n>and forsaketh</n> יְרֻחָֽם׃ <sup>7355 </sup> <n>[them] shall have mercy</n>
14: אַשְׁרֵ֣י <sup>835 </sup> <n>Happy</n> אָ֭דָם <sup>120 </sup> <n>[is] the man</n> מְפַחֵ֣ד <sup>6342 </sup> <n>that feareth</n> תָּמִ֑יד <sup>8548 </sup> <n>alway</n> וּמַקְשֶׁ֥ה <sup>7185 </sup> <n>but he that hardeneth</n> לִ֝בּ֗וֹ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>his heart</n> יִפּ֥וֹל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>shall fall</n> בְּרָעָֽה׃ <sup>7451 </sup> <n>into mischief</n>
15: אֲרִי־ <sup>738 </sup> <n>lion</n> נֹ֭הֵם <sup>5098 </sup> <n>[As] a roaring</n> וְדֹ֣ב <sup>1677 </sup> <n>bear</n> שׁוֹקֵ֑ק <sup>8264 </sup> <n>and a ranging</n> מֹשֵׁ֥ל <sup>4910 </sup> <n>ruler</n> רָ֝שָׁ֗ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>[so is] a wicked</n> עַ֣ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> עַם־ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>people</n> דָּֽל׃ <sup>1800 </sup> <n>over the poor</n>
16: נָגִ֗יד <sup>5057 </sup> <n>The prince</n> חֲסַ֣ר <sup>2638 </sup> <n>that wanteth</n> תְּ֭בוּנוֹת <sup>8394 </sup> <n>understanding</n> וְרַ֥ב <sup>7227 </sup> <n>[is] also a great</n> מַעֲשַׁקּ֑וֹת <sup>4642 </sup> <n>oppressor</n> [שֹׂנְאֵי כ] (שֹׂ֥נֵא <sup>8130 </sup> <n>enemy</n> ק) בֶ֝֗צַע <sup>1215 </sup> <n>covetousness</n> יַאֲרִ֥יךְ <sup>748 </sup> <n>shall prolong</n> יָמִֽים׃ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[his] days</n> פ
17: אָ֭דָם <sup>120 </sup> <n>A man</n> עָשֻׁ֣ק <sup>6231 </sup> <n>that doeth violence</n> בְּדַם־ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>to the blood</n> נָ֑פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>of [any] person</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> בּ֥וֹר <sup>953 </sup> <n>to the pit</n> יָ֝נ֗וּס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>shall flee</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>no</n> יִתְמְכוּ־ <sup>8551 </sup> <n>let no man stay</n> בֽוֹ׃
18: הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Whoso walketh</n> תָּ֭מִים <sup>8549 </sup> <n>uprightly</n> יִוָּשֵׁ֑עַ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>shall be saved</n> וְנֶעְקַ֥שׁ <sup>6140 </sup> <n>but [he that is] perverse</n> דְּ֝רָכַ֗יִם <sup>1870 </sup> <n>[in his] ways</n> יִפּ֥וֹל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>shall fall</n> בְּאֶחָֽת׃ <sup>259 </sup> <n>at once</n>
19: עֹבֵ֣ד <sup>5647 </sup> <n>He that tilleth</n> אַ֭דְמָתוֹ <sup>127 </sup> <n>his land</n> יִֽשְׂבַּֽע־ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>shall have plenty</n> לָ֑חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>of bread</n> וּמְרַדֵּ֥ף <sup>7291 </sup> <n>but he that followeth</n> רֵ֝קִ֗ים <sup>7386 </sup> <n>after vain</n> יִֽשְׂבַּֽע־ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>plenty</n> רִֽישׁ׃ <sup>7389 </sup> <n>[persons] shall have poverty enough</n>
20: אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> אֱ֭מוּנוֹת <sup>530 </sup> <n>A faithful</n> רַב־ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>shall abound</n> בְּרָכ֑וֹת <sup>1293 </sup> <n>with blessings</n> וְאָ֥ץ <sup>213 </sup> <n>but he that maketh haste</n> לְ֝הַעֲשִׁ֗יר <sup>6238 </sup> <n>to be rich</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> יִנָּקֶֽה׃ <sup>5352 </sup> <n>shall not be innocent</n>
21: הַֽכֵּר־ <sup>5234 </sup> <n>To have respect</n> פָּנִ֥ים <sup>6440 </sup> <n>of persons</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> ט֑וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>[is] not good</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>Because</n> פַּת־ <sup>6595 </sup> <n>for for a piece</n> לֶ֝֗חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>of bread</n> יִפְשַׁע־ <sup>6586 </sup> <n>will transgress</n> גָּֽבֶר׃ <sup>1397 </sup> <n>[that] man</n>
22: נִֽבֳהָ֥ל <sup>926 </sup> <n>that hasteth</n> לַה֗וֹן <sup>1952 </sup> <n>to be rich</n> אִ֭ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>He</n> רַ֣ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>[hath] an evil</n> עָ֑יִן <sup>5869 </sup> <n>eye</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and does not</n> יֵ֝דַע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and considereth</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> חֶ֥סֶר <sup>2639 </sup> <n>not that poverty</n> יְבֹאֶֽנּוּ׃ <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n>
23: מ֘וֹכִ֤יחַ <sup>3198 </sup> <n>He that rebuketh</n> אָדָ֣ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>a man</n> אַ֭חֲרַי <sup>310 </sup> <n>afterwards</n> חֵ֣ן <sup>2580 </sup> <n>more favour</n> יִמְצָ֑א <sup>4672 </sup> <n>shall find</n> מִֽמַּחֲלִ֥יק <sup>2505 </sup> <n>than he that flattereth</n> לָשֽׁוֹן׃ <sup>3956 </sup> <n>with the tongue</n>
24: גּוֹזֵ֤ל ׀ <sup>1497 </sup> <n>Whoso robbeth</n> אָ֘בִ֤יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>his father</n> וְאִמּ֗וֹ <sup>517 </sup> <n>or his mother</n> וְאֹמֵ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and saith</n> אֵֽין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>is not</n> פָּ֑שַׁע <sup>6588 </sup> <n>[It is] no transgression</n> חָבֵ֥ר <sup>2270 </sup> <n>the same [is] the companion</n> ה֝֗וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לְאִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>of a man</n> מַשְׁחִֽית׃ <sup>7843 </sup> <n>destroys</n>
25: רְחַב־ <sup>7342 </sup> <n>He that is of a proud</n> נֶ֭פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>heart</n> יְגָרֶ֣ה <sup>1624 </sup> <n>stirreth up</n> מָד֑וֹן <sup>4066 </sup> <n>strife</n> וּבוֹטֵ֖חַ <sup>982 </sup> <n>but he that putteth his trust</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>in the LORD</n> יְדֻשָּֽׁן׃ <sup>1878 </sup> <n>shall be made fat</n>
26: בּוֹטֵ֣חַ <sup>982 </sup> <n>He that trusteth</n> בְּ֭לִבּוֹ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>in his own heart</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> כְסִ֑יל <sup>3684 </sup> <n>is a fool</n> וְהוֹלֵ֥ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>but whoso walketh</n> בְּ֝חָכְמָ֗ה <sup>2451 </sup> <n>wisely</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יִמָּלֵֽט׃ <sup>4422 </sup> <n>he shall be delivered</n>
27: נוֹתֵ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>He that giveth</n> לָ֭רָשׁ <sup>7326 </sup> <n>unto the poor</n> אֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>will never</n> מַחְס֑וֹר <sup>4270 </sup> <n>shall not lack</n> וּמַעְלִ֥ים <sup>5956 </sup> <n>but he that hideth</n> עֵ֝ינָ֗יו <sup>5869 </sup> <n>his eyes</n> רַב־ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>shall have many</n> מְאֵרֽוֹת׃ <sup>3994 </sup> <n>a curse</n>
28: בְּק֣וּם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>rise</n> רְ֭שָׁעִים <sup>7563 </sup> <n>When the wicked</n> יִסָּתֵ֣ר <sup>5641 </sup> <n>hide</n> אָדָ֑ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>men</n> וּ֝בְאָבְדָ֗ם <sup>6 </sup> <n>themselves but when they perish</n> יִרְבּ֥וּ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>increase</n> צַדִּיקִֽים׃ <sup>6662 </sup> <n>the righteous</n>
